thread.title: Best NYC Hotel experience ever
thread.title_full: Best NYC Hotel experience ever - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: W5146PDpatriciac
title: Best NYC Hotel experience ever
text: There was never a moment when I felt like the staff was not happy to have me there, was not happy to help in any way. They were pleased to be of any service that I required. I felt they were exceptional at every level. I had nothing but an excellent experience there. Moving forward, I will always stay at the Iroquois for any NYC visit I make. I look forward to checking out the special rates and prices that your reception staff told me were available on your website. I understand that weekends are often less expensive and certain months. Thank you for a wonderful stay in your perfectly located hotel!
